column2: an A.M. Eatery////The wait can be very long (I've waited over an hour for a table
column3: but I was in no rush with my friends)
column4: but they do provide complementary coffee for your wait and activities for kids
column6: to do while you wait. There is a bar where you can order specialty drinks such as mochas or breakfast cocktails
column7: while you wait. Be warned though
column8: that if you have to wait around an hour during the summer
column9: there is no room to wait inside
column10: and outside can get very hot very quick with that morning sun
column11: so make sure to wear a hat.
